dct_alternative_sm: Situs Terrae promissionis SS Bibliorum intelligentiam exacte aperiens
dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Bar scale on map given in "Miliaria vnius horae".
Shows topography, drainage, roads and paths, places of historical interest.
Features illustrations of ships, sea monsters, people, settlements.
